hadiths.text: Narrated Muawiya:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "A group of my followers will keep on following Allah's Laws strictly and they will not be harmed by those who will disbelieve them or stand against them till Allah's Order (The Hour) will come while they will be in that state

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى {إِنَّمَا قَوْلُنَا لِشَىْءٍ إذا أردناه أن نقول له كن فيكون}
chapter.eng-name: “Verily! Our Word unto a thing when We intend it.…”
